text: James Timothy McCarver (October 16, 1941 - February 16, 2023) was an American sportscaster and professional baseball catcher. McCarver played for the St. Louis Cardinals, Philadelphia Phillies, Montreal Expos, and Boston Red Sox between 1959 and 1980.McCarver gets call from Baseball Hall of Fame, St. Louis Post-Dispatch (July 15, 2012) McCarver died of heart failure in Memphis, Tennessee on February 16, 2023, exactly four months after his 81st birthday. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Memphis, Tennessee Category:American sports commentators
title: Tim McCarver
